title: Web Exposure Rating Dashboard
description: The Reflectiz Web Exposure Rating Dashboard is your centralized hub for an overview of your Reflectiz Rating Data. This dashboard offers actionable insights to help you manage and secure your websites effectively.

definition.content:
### About This Dashboard  

Welcome to your Reflectiz **Web Exposure Rating Dashboard**, your centralized hub for an overview of your Reflectiz Rating Data. This dashboard offers actionable insights to help you manage and secure your websites effectively.  

**To get the most accurate and relevant insights**:  
- **Filter the dashboard by a specific site and scan** to narrow the data to your desired site.  
  - In the "Website Scan Overview" under the "Last Scan Per SIte" table, select the latest scan for you desired site.
  - Then select "Template Variables", and set both the reflectiz.site & reflectiz.scan variables
- **Optional: By selecting a Datadog host, your can review risks associated with any website running on that host.**
  - Select the host using the filter at the top left of the dashboard

### About the Rating Feature  

Exposure Rating is Reflectizâ€™s innovative grading system to assess risk exposure for websites. With Reflectiz, you can obtain an Exposure Rating for every website, application, and domain in context within your web environments, benchmarked against industry leaders in your sector. 

The Reflectiz Rating system provides a clear and intuitive score between **1 and 4**:  
- **1** indicates significant risks that require immediate attention.  
- **4** represents an optimal state with minimal risks.  

Each rating is directly linked to detailed logs, allowing you to drill down into the **risks associated with specific apps or domains**. Simply click on a rating to view the related logs and address any highlighted issues proactively.  

For more in-depth analysis and additional platform features, visit the [Reflectiz Platform](https://dashboard.reflectiz.com/main/dashboard)

Stay informed and take control of your digital landscape with Reflectiz.
